ComicInfo.Title: The Dilemma of Dr. Blake!; While the City Shrieks!
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Dilemma of Dr. Blake!: Karnilla releases Sif and the Destroyer falls unconscious. Thor is then transported to the land of the Norns to battle Ulik. Odin goes to Midgard to retrieve the inert Destroyer.
While the City Shrieks!: Triton returns and tells Black Bolt the danger that humans pose to the world, causing Black Bolt to begin searching for a new hidden refuge.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:25:23. [Issue ID 21877]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
